Changes:
1. Added `border-collapse` and a border to the table element
2. Added borders to all header cells (`th`) with color #456882

Changes:
1. Added `border-collapse` and a border to the table element
2. Added borders to all header cells (`th`) with color #456882
3. Added borders to all data cells (`td`) with color #456882

Both tables now have consistent visible grid lines with the specified color.
